data.title: 200 Hot Girl Names That Guys Are Most Attracted To
data.meta_description: Hot girl names are chic and have a charisma unmatched by no other types of names. Know some trendy hot girl names and pick a unique name for your baby girl.
data.text:
All names are beautiful and hot. However, a few names do make one turn around. So, if you’re looking for such names for your baby girl, here is our list of hot girl names. You may have heard these names below many times. But it is the sound, their pronunciation styles, and their origins make them attractive and sizzling. Adding a vowel sound to the name towards the end increases its sensuous factor. We have included such hot names that will make your girl stand out in this post.

Sensuous And Hot Girl Names

1. Aaliyah

Aliyah

is a playful and sporty name, which never seems to get out of fashion. It means ‘elevated’.

2. Abby

Abby is a fun and cute name, meaning ‘father rejoiced’.

3. Acadia

Acadia, meaning ‘land of plenty’, has a magnetic allure, which is hard to escape.

4. Ada

The name Ada is sexy, classy, and stunningly beautiful. Ada means ‘noble’.

5. Adrena

Adrena is a hot and sexy girl name, which everyone will love to have. It means ‘happiness’.

6. Adrienne

It just cannot get anymore captivating and classy. Adrienne means ‘from the city Hadria’.

7. Agnes

Mysterious and exotic, Agnes means ‘pure and holy’.

8. Alessandra

Alessandra, the Spanish version of Alexandra, meaning ‘defending men’ sounds even prettier than original.

9. Alessia

Sultry Alessia has a mysterious aura, which everyone can’t help but love. It means ‘defending warrior’.

10. Alexa

There are several versions of this name, including Alexandria and Alexis, but Alexa got to be the hottest. It means ‘defender of man’.

11. Alison

This racy English name is rarely heard in America. So grab it before it becomes common. Alison means ‘noble’.

12. Aly

Aly is carefree, energetic, bubbly and irresistible in her own sweet ways. It means ‘noble’.

13. Alyona

Alyona, meaning ‘bright light’, hints a woman full of joy, glamor, and sexiness.

14. Amanda

This salacious name is derived from a Latin word meaning ‘loved’.

15. Amelia

Amelia sounds sexy and seductive and means ‘industrious’, making it a perfect example of beauty with brains.

16. Anais

Anais, meaning ‘grace’, is uncommon and erotic, particularly because it’s attached to the American novelist, Anais Nin.

17. Angel

It’s quite obvious why this name is popular with parents.

18. Angelique

This name is indeed ‘angelic’, but with a sultry twist.

19. Anya

We must say Anya is the most spectacular and stylish version of Anna. It means ‘grace’.

20. April

April is a charming, old timey seasonal name, meaning ‘to open’.

21. Aria

Aria, sounding a lot like Arya, is red hot right now, all thanks to “Game of Thrones”. Aria means ‘air’.

22. Arielle

Playful, sweet Arielle, the French version of Ariel has gained popularity in its own right. It means ‘lion of God’.

23. Artemesia

This compelling name is a variant of Artemis, the name of a Greek mythology goddess. Artemesia means ‘gift from Artemis’.

24. Ashley

An amorous name for parents who’re drawn towards nature. Ashley means ‘lives in the groves of ash tree’.

25. Aurora

Aurora isn’t just a beautiful natural phenomenon, but also a gorgeous and appealing girl name. It means ‘Roman goddess of the dawn’.

26. Aviva

Aviva, meaning ‘springtime’, is perfect for your vivacious daughter.

27. Beatrix

All thanks to the ‘x’ for making this boring name stunning. Beatrix means ‘she who brings happiness’.

28. Becky

I think we all know a hot girl who’s named Becky. Becky means ‘captivated’.

29. Blair

Blair, meaning ‘plain’, holds some serious sexiness.

30. Brandy

An alcohol-laced name has to be sexy. Brandy means ‘burnt wine’.

31. Brenda

Brenda is a sharp and stylish moniker, meaning ‘blade’.

32. Brianna

Brianna, meaning ‘strong’, may sound like a modern invention name, but it has been in use since the 16thcentury.

33. Bridgette

Bridgette is a beautiful and classic name, meaning ‘power, strength, vigor’.

34. Briony

Briony is an offbeat and exuberant name, meaning ‘sprout’.

35. Brooke

Parents who want a tantalizing nature inspired name should look no further than Brooke, which means ‘stream’.

36. Buffy

Buffy isn’t just associated with the vampire slayer, but also hundreds of sexy girls around the globe. It means ‘pledged to God’.

37. Callie

Callie, meaning ‘dweller on the plain’, is a perfect example of new school meets old school twist.

38. Candice

Candice is a variation of Candace, the title used by ancient Ethiopian queens. It means ‘white and pure’.

39. Candy

Candy is both naughty and nice. It means ‘bright’.

40. Carina

Carina is a tempting Italian name, meaning ‘dear’.

41. Carmen

Carmen, meaning ‘garden’, brings to mind two bombshells – Carmen Electra and Carmen Miranda.

42. Caroline

This fancy sounding name is sexy and cute at the same time. Caroline means ‘strong’.

43. Cece

Cece, the short form of Cecilia, meaning ‘blind’ is gaining traction lately.

44. Celestina

This seductive name has a lovely meaning, ‘heavenly’.

45. Chanel

This name is associated with one of the most powerful, liberated, and intriguing women of the 20thcentury. Chanel means ‘canal’.

46. Charis

Charis is a dark and sexy name, meaning ‘grace, kindness, and life’.

47. Charlie

Charlie, the spicy nickname for Charlotte, shares the same meaning as the original, ‘free man’.

48. Charlotte

We think Charlotte sounds highly seductive. It means ‘free man’.

49. Cher

Cher, meaning ‘dear’, is associated with the beautiful and talented America actress of the same name.

50. Chloe

Chloe is a dynamic Greek name, meaning ‘young green shoot’.

51. Claire

An enticing name with a lovely meaning. Claire means ‘bright’.

52. Clarise

A girl named Clarise will always find a way to get what she wants. Clarise means ‘fame’.

53. Clementine

This moniker, meaning ‘mild and merciful’, sounds incredibly sweet to the ears.

54. Connie

Connie, meaning ‘steadfastness’, is effortlessly sexy, and of course, retro.

55. Courtney

This name, meaning ‘short nose’, carries with itself the sexiness of Courtney Cox.

56. Cynthia

Cynthia, meaning ‘from Mount Cynthus’, will give your daughter an extra edge.

57. Dahlia

This Latin moniker, meaning ‘scientific’, sounds totally glamorous.

58. Dana

There are just a few names that can match the class of Dana. Dana means ‘from Denmark’.

59. Daniella

This hot name of the last decade is considered stylish by some parents even today. Daniella means ‘beloved’.

60. Daphne

Daphne is a warm, friendly, and bewitching name, meaning ‘bay tree’.

61. Debra

Debra is the updated version of Deborah and means ‘bee’.

62. Delilah

The sexy siren of a name, Delilah means ‘amorous’.

63. Delphine

This poetic and charismatic name, meaning ‘dolphin’, is perfect for a girl living by the sea.

64. Dixie

This short and sassy name is highly popular in Southern America. It means ‘born on tenth’.

65. Dominique

Dominique originated as a unisex name, but is now used only for girls. This sophisticated French name means ‘belonging to a lord’.

66. Edie

Edie, meaning ‘prosperous in war’, is a name for girls with big bangs, big eyes, and monochrome smocks.

67. Eileen

Eileen, the Gaelic form of Helen, is surging in popularity. It means ‘shining light’.

68. Eldora

If you want something poetic as well as sexy, go for Eldora, which means ‘bathed in gold’.

69. Elena

Elena, meaning ‘shining light’, has the spark, which your daughter will definitely love.

70. Elina

Don’t you think Elina has a magical feel to it? It means ‘shining light’.

71. Eliza

Eliza is a prim, proper, and racy name, meaning ‘oath of God’.

72. Elle

Elle, meaning ‘she’, has loads of chic cache behind it.

73. Emelda

Emelda, meaning ‘emerald like’, is simply stunning!

74. Emily

Emily indeed sounds sexy, but it’s the meaning (industrious and hardworking) we like the most.

75. Emma

Emma is pleasant, sweet sounding, and easy to spell and remember. It means ‘universal’.

76. Erika

The ‘k’ in this spunky name makes it look distinctive. It means ‘eternal ruler’.

77. Esmeralda

Esmeralda is an enchanting, broody, and alluring name, meaning ‘emerald’.

78. Etta

A name with serious rock ‘n’ roll pedigree, Etta means ‘estate ruler’.

79. Faina

A name shrouded in mystery and even sexiness, Faina means ‘shining’.

80. Fern

Fern is a carefree and hippie name, meaning ‘nonflowering plant’.

81. Fiorella

If you adore floral theme names, you’re gonna love Fiorella, which means ‘flower’.

82. Flora

A name with wholesome goodness, Flora means ‘flower’.

83. Francesca

Francesca may be centuries old, but it still sounds sexy and exotic. It means ‘free one’.

84. Freya

Freya is a bold, daring, and fiery name, meaning ‘lady’.

85. Galina

Galina, meaning ‘calm’, is class apart. It’s the name of the mermaid goddess who could calm all the oceans.

86. Gaynor

Gaynor is a bewitchingly beautiful name, meaning ‘white and smooth’.

87. Gia

Italian female names have the sexiest sound and Gia is no different. It means ‘God’s gracious gift’.

88. Giada

This hot name has been buzzing lately, all thanks to the celeb chef Giada De Laurentiis. Giada means ‘jade’.

89. Gigi

The namesake of this hot French diminutive is none other than Gigi Hadid, the sultry model.

90. Giuliana

A bit naughtier than the original Juliana, Giuliana means ‘youthful’.

91. Greta

Greta is a universally popular and no nonsense name meaning ‘pearl’.

92. Gretchen

This name will always keep your daughter ahead of the trend. Gretchen means ‘pearl’.

93. Hazel

The ‘z’ in the middle makes this moniker incredibly inviting. Hazel means ‘tree, nut’.

94. Inez

If you’re unsure about Agnes, you can consider it’s titillating Portuguese version, meaning ‘pure’.

95. Irina

The roots of Irina can be traced all the way back to Ancient Greece. It’s a variation of Eirene, the name of a Greek goddess meaning ‘peace’.

96. Iris

Iris, meaning ‘rainbow’, is one of the sexiest floral names.

97. Isla

Isla is a simple, yet steamy Scottish moniker, meaning ‘island’.

98. Ivy

Don’t let Poison Ivy spoil this name for you. Ivy is a supremely hot name, meaning ‘faithfulness’.

99. Jackie

Jackie may not be popular now, but it still retains the charm. It means ‘God is gracious’.

100. Jade

With this moniker, your daughter will out shine around here. Jade means ‘stone of the colic’.

101. Janet

Janet is the bodacious version of Jane and means ‘God’s gracious gift’.

102. Jenna

Jenna is a fresher alternative to Jennifer, meaning ‘white shadow, white wave’.

103. Jessa

Jessa is a cool and cosmopolitan name, meaning ‘God beholds’.

104. Jessica

Jessica isn’t just hauntingly sexy, but also powerful. It means ‘rich, God beholds’.

105. Juliet

You know the name is sensual when it’s associated with one of the most romantic female characters of all time. Juliet means ‘Jove’s child’.

106. Juniper

Juniper is a fresh and earthy tree name with loads of energy and charm.

107. Kai

With its easy pronunciation and exotic roots, Kai is a perfect sexy name for your daughter. It means ‘sea’.

108. Karen

This luscious name is experiencing a meteoric rise. Karen means ‘pure’.

109. Karly

Karly is a sensual name with a dark and brooding side. It means ‘womanly, strength’.

110. Kassandra

Kassandra is a bold and confident name originally belonging to the daughter of the king of Troy. It means ‘unheeded prophetess’.

111. Kate

Kate, meaning ‘pure’, refers to internal beauty, as opposed to superficial ones we get to see today.

112. Katie

Watch out! This catty name has claws! Katie means ‘pure’.

113. Katiya

Sweet, but spicy name Katiya, meaning ‘pure’, will pair nicely with longer last names.

114. Kayla

Kayla, meaning ‘keeper of the keys, pure’, is one of those names that drip with sexuality.

115. Kelly

This bouncy and vivacious name, meaning ‘war’, is gaining popularity with every passing day.

116. Kiera

Kiera, meaning ‘little dark one’, sounds pretty, feminine, and glamorous.

117. Klara

Klara, meaning ‘clear’, is used on almost every continent in one form or the other. But this version is hands down the sexiest.

118. Lacey

This totally sounds like the name of a valley girl. Lacey means ‘the bright one’.

119. Lana

Lana, the short form of Alana, is a strong choice for a modern girl. It means ‘little rock’.

120. Larissa

This beautiful moniker, meaning ‘protection’, just rolls off the tongue.

121. Laura

Laura, meaning ‘bay laurel’, sounds sexy and feminine, without being fussy.

122. Leighton

Leighton is a complex, but tantalizing name, meaning ‘herb garden’.

123. Leila

This Arabic origin name, meaning ‘night beauty’, has a high sensual quotient.

124. Leilani

A sexy name from the beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Leilani means ‘garland of flowers’.

125. Lena

Lena, the diminutive of Helena is simple, multicultural, and captivating.

126. Lenore

Lenore is the modernization of classic name Leonora. It means ‘light’.

127. Lexi

Lexi is a smart and adorable diminutive of Alexandra meaning ‘defending mankind’.

128. Liliana

Lily is cute, but Liliana is sensuous. This Latin name means ‘lily’.

129. Lindsey

Lindsey is a beguiling English name, meaning ‘marshlands of Lincolnshire’.

130. Liza

Liza is a quirky, trendy, and ravishing name, meaning ‘oath of God’.

131. Luciana

This beguiling name, meaning ‘light’, can easily be shortened to Lucy or Luci for the nickname.

132. Lulu

This sweet and sexy name, meaning ‘pearl’, is thin on the ground presently. So pick it up fast!

133. Mabel

Mabel, meaning ‘lovable’ is a saucy and offbeat, just perfect for girls of this generation.

134. Mae

Mae is a sweet, spring-like, and captivating name, meaning ‘bitter’.

135. Maria

The Latin twang of Maria makes it sound highly sensuous. It means ‘wished for child’.

136. Mariella

Lilting Mariella will make a great alternative to Marissa. It means ‘bitter’.

137. Meave

Meave is an Irish name with sensuous meaning, ‘she who intoxicates’.

138. Megan

Megan is funky, sporty, and sexy, all rolled into one. It means ‘pearl’.

139. Mia

This short and sexy name, meaning ‘wished for child’, is adored by parents all over the world.

140. Molly

Molly, the diminutive of Mary, is mild, yet saucy. It means ‘bitter’.

141. Monique

Parents who’re looking for a sexier alternative to Monica can zero on Monique, its French version means ‘advisor’.

142. Nadia

This sexy Slavic name, meaning ‘hope’, is popular across various cultures.

143. Naomi

Naomi, meaning ‘pleasant’, is one of the sexiest girl names.

144. Natalia

This flexible name would sound amazing on girls of every ethnicity. It means ‘born on Christmas day’.

145. Natasha

This sexy and seductive name, with a sizeable number of variations, has the power of making the bearer look good. It means ‘born on Christmas Day’.

146. Neve

This tiny, but mighty name is the English version of Irish name Niamh, meaning ‘snow’.

147. Nicolette

Nicole

is quite alluring on its own, but the –ette, in the end, makes it charismatic. It means ‘victorious people’.

148. Nina

This traditional Russian name, meaning ‘little girl’, originated as a short form of Giannina and Antonina, but stands firm on its own today.

149. Octavia

This moniker may be old school, but is also tremendously sexy. Octavia means ‘born eighth.’

150. Odette

This French name, meaning ‘wealthy’, is as popular as it was during World War II.

151. Olivia

There’s a bunch of smoking hot Olivias in the world, Olivia Hussey, Olivia Wilde, and Olivia D’Abo to name a few. Olivia means ‘olive’.

152. Ondina

Beach bums can name their daughter Ondina, which means ‘little wave’.

153. Paisley

This psychedelic print name, meaning ‘church’, was one of the fastest rising names in 2016.

154. Paulina

From Paulina Porizkova to Paulina Gretzky, we totally get what’s hot about this name. Paulina means ‘small’.

155. Paz

This one syllable charmer originates from the Spanish word for ‘peace’.

156. Phoebe

Phoebe, meaning ‘radiant, shining one’, isn’t just delightful, but also badass, as it’s associated with the goddess of hunting.

157. Quinn

Quinn is tied to a badass comic book villainess, and that’s what makes it sexy. It means ‘intelligence’.

158. Radinka

Your daughter is sure to be the only Radinka in her classroom, or even school. Radinka means ‘active’.

159. Rae

This diminutive of Rachel, meaning ‘ewe’, is perfectly capable of standing strong on its own.

160. Raisa

This sensuous, three syllable name has appeared in several languages, but with different meanings. In Hebrew, Raisa means ‘ewe’, and in Arabic, it means ‘leader’.

161. Ramona

Ramona, meaning ‘wise protector’, has the right amount of sexiness in it.

162. Rebecca

Rebecca still sounds a lot saucier than its modern diminutive Becca. It means ‘servant of God’.

163. Regina

Your daughter will get truckloads of confidence with this name. Regina means ‘queen’.

164. Renee

Thanks to Zellweger for bringing Renee back in the public eye. Renee means ‘reborn’.

165. Rosalie

All thanks to sexy Rosalie Hale for breathing life back to this name. Rosalie means ‘rose’.

166. Roxanne

Roxanne, meaning ‘dawn’, is too titillating to pass up.

167. Ruby

This red precious stone name is sassy, sultry, and vibrant.

168. Sasha

A name that has some of the sexiest bearers such as Sasha Meneghel, Sasha Allen, and Sasha Pieterse. Sasha means ‘defending men’.

169. Scarlett

Who said vintage names cannot be sexy? Take Scarlett, meaning ‘red’ for example.

170. Seraphina

This Hebrew name is derived from the name of the six winged seraphim, the highest ranking angels. It means ‘fiery’.

171. Serena

This moniker is an embodiment of a strong and sexy woman. Serena means ‘tranquil’.

172. Shay

This strong and straight forward name, meaning ‘stately’, bring to mind the sultry character from “Game of Thrones”.

173. Shirley

Shirley Temple should be credited for propelling this moniker to greater heights. This English name means ‘meadow’.

174. Sia

After Gia and Mia, it’s time for Sia to take a flight. This hot Persian name means ‘one who brings joy’.

175. Simone

Monikers derived from boys’ names sound incredibly gamine and sassy, take Simone for instance. It means ‘one who hears’.

176. Skylar

Skylar is a fun, flirty, and unpretentious name, meaning ‘scholar’.

177. Sloan

Sleek, sexy and sophisticated Sloan will continue to rise, with or without the ‘e’ at the end. Sloan means ‘warrior’.

178. Sophia

Sophia has hundreds of variations and each sound sexy in their own good way. This name means ‘wisdom’.

179. Soraya

This exotic name, made famous by the Empress of Iran, means ‘jewel’.

180. Spencer

This unisex name, meaning ‘keeper of a province’, will refer to the strength of your daughter.

181. Stella

Stella, meaning ‘star’, manages to be sweet and sexy at the same time.

182. Stevie

This ultra-cool moniker refers to Stevie Dance, the fashion editor of Pop Magazine. Stevie means ‘crown’.

183. Sybil

“Downtown Abbey” fans can consider the steamy Greek name Sybil, meaning ‘prophetess’ for their daughter.

184. Talisa

Don’t you think Talisa sounds extremely sexy? It means ‘consecrated to God’.

185. Tallulah

This hip Irish name is the Anglicized version of Tuilelaith, meaning ‘lady of abundance or leaping water’.

186. Taryn

This moniker is as explosive as its meaning ‘thunder’.

187. Tatyana

Sensuous Roman clan name Tatyana, is relatively rare and practically unknown in the western world.

188. Taylor

Not just Taylor, but even its nickname Tay sounds highly magnetic. It means ‘tailor’.

189. Tessa

No one you know can guess that this exquisite name is originally a diminutive of Theresa. Tessa means ‘to reap’.

190. Thora

This moniker’s claim to fame is none other than actress Thora Birch. Thora means ‘thunder’.

191. Ursula

Thanks to the villainess from “Little Mermaid” for giving a sinister and sensuous vibe to this name. Ursula means ‘bear’.

192. Vanessa

Vanessa, meaning ‘butterfly’, always brings to mind a sassy and passionate lady.

193. Veronica

Not just the root name, even the nicknames of Veronica, such as Nikki, Nika, Ronnie, and Vera sound incredibly sexy.

194. Violet

This dazzling name conjures images of a beautiful girl with dark eyes. Violet means ‘purple’.

195. Yazmin

Yazmin is an exotically beautiful name, meaning ‘jasmine’.

196. Yesenia

Yesenia is an exotic Arabic name, meaning ‘flower’. It’s quite surprising that it isn’t used a lot in Arab.

197. Zara

This evocative Arabic name was once reserved for sultry movie characters. It means ‘princess; to blossom’.

198. Zarya

This striking, but unusual name is rarely heard outside Arab countries and Russia. Zarya means ‘sunrise’.

199. Zenaida

Zenaida, derived from the male name Zeus, will bring greatness and power to your daughter. Zenaida means ‘born of Zeus’.

200. Zita

Zita is a creative name, meaning ‘little girl’.

Discover More Names

When you have to choose a name for your baby, a few hundreds of names may not be just enough. Keep digging our mine of baby names until you find that one precious gem.

Although each name carries its charm, a few tend to create a great first impression. We have accumulated such hot girl names in this list today. These names have been popularized by many works of literature and films that have added to their famous nature. While a few of these names, such as Aaliyah, Inez, Shay, and Odette, are unique, others, such as Olivia, Karen, Emma, and Juliet, are common hot girl names. Either way, all the names in this list have a beautiful sound and unique pronunciation styles. This makes these names an irresistible choice to name your baby girl.
